author: dkhaywood
msg: nof-reflector-java: impact of renaming FacetFactorySet to ProgrammingModel; JavaReflector now requires a non-null DomainObjectContainer specified in constructor (but NakedObjectConfiguration can still be left null);  minor doc changes + simple generics

author: dkhaywood
msg: Test impls of NakedObject impacted with changes (removed listener/instance stuff, added stuff relating to implementing Instance<NakedObjectSpecification>).

author: dkhaywood
msg: NakedObjectPersistorAbstract - modified to support NakedObjectFactory; reorganized methods lexically; now uses constructor-based dependency injection rather than setter based dependency injection (better describes its dependencies).

author: dkhaywood
msg: Added PojoAdapterFactory.java as a concrete impl of NakedObjectFactory.

author: dkhaywood
msg: NakedObjectSpecification - retrofitted to extend from Specification.  Doesn't change its set of methods.
